title: 09/25: Waiver Wire, Fitzpatrick's Outlook and More (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Who are our top priorities this week (1:30) and how much FAAB should you spend on them (4:08)? We've got players who may not be available in your leagues like Calvin Ridley and Aaron Jones, but of course plenty of underowned players like Tyler Boyd and Chris Godwin. Plus a sneak peak at each position (8:33), DSTs (12:00) and IDP help (13:00) ... News and notes (17:40), IdiotMoron moves (22:00), DET-NE  recap (24:15), PIT-TB recap (29:30) and the Dropometer (35:40) ... Waiver Wire QBs (40:00) including Andy Dalton and Ryan Tannehill, RBs (45:12) including Buck Allen and Chris Ivory, WRs (47:30) including Geronimo Allison and Antonio Callaway, TEs (53;00) including Benjamin Watson and Rhett Ellison plus more DSTs and Kickers ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
